name: Egyptian Museum
description: Ancient artifacts including Tutankhamun’s treasures.

name: Khan el-Khalili
description: Historic bazaar for souvenirs, spices, and cafes.

name: Pyramids of Giza
description: Iconic pyramids and Sphinx; options for guided tours and camel rides.

name: Bibliotheca Alexandrina
description: Modern library and cultural center with exhibits.

name: Al-Azhar Park
description: Green park with panoramic views of Cairo and historical architecture.

name: Cairo Tower
description: Observation tower offering wide views of the city.

name: National Museum of Egyptian Civilization
description: Museum showcasing Egyptian history including the Royal Mummies Hall.

name: The Hanging Church
description: Historic Coptic church built above an ancient gate tower.

name: Pharaonic Village
description: Interactive experience showing life in ancient Egypt.

name: Montaza Palace Gardens
description: Beautiful gardens by the sea surrounding the royal palace.

name: Citadel of Qaitbay
description: Historic fortress built on the site of the ancient Lighthouse of Alexandria.

name: Alexandria National Museum
description: Museum showcasing Alexandria's diverse cultural history.

name: Stanley Bridge
description: Beautiful modern bridge with seaside views and walking area.

name: Royal Jewelry Museum
description: Displays exquisite royal jewelry from Egypt’s monarchy era.

name: Karnak Temple
description: Massive temple complex dedicated to ancient Egyptian gods.

name: Valley of the Kings
description: Ancient burial site of Egyptian pharaohs.

name: Luxor Temple
description: Temple complex beautifully lit at night.

name: Colossi of Memnon
description: Two massive stone statues of Pharaoh Amenhotep III.

name: Luxor Museum
description: Showcases important artifacts from ancient Thebes.

name: Philae Temple
description: Temple dedicated to the goddess Isis, located on an island.

name: Nubian Village
description: Colorful village showcasing Nubian culture and traditions.

name: Unfinished Obelisk
description: Ancient quarry with the largest known obelisk that was never completed.

name: Aswan Botanical Garden
description: Island garden with exotic plants and peaceful walking paths.

name: Abu Simbel Temples
description: Massive rock temples built by Ramses II.

name: Ras Mohammed National Park
description: Famous for diving, coral reefs, and marine life.

name: Naama Bay
description: Popular bay with restaurants, nightlife, and water activities.

name: SOHO Square
description: Shopping and entertainment district with nightlife and family activities.

name: Shark’s Bay
description: Quiet beach area perfect for snorkeling.

name: Old Market (Sharm el-Maya)
description: Traditional market area with cafes and souvenir shops.

name: Giftun Island
description: White-sand island famous for snorkeling and boat trips.

name: Hurghada Marina
description: Modern marina with restaurants, sea views, and nightlife.

name: El-Dahar Square
description: Traditional market area with local shops and food.

name: Orange Bay
description: Premium beach with crystal-clear waters and hammocks.

name: Sand City Museum
description: Outdoor museum featuring impressive sand sculptures.
